statements: SELECT * FROM resource_allocation
SELECT employee_id, laptop_id FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocation_date = '2022-10-15'
SELECT software_license_id, allocation_status FROM resource_allocation WHERE employee_id = 101
SELECT employee_id, laptop_id, software_license_id FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocation_status = 'Active'
SELECT * FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocation_status = 'Inactive' ORDER BY allocation_date DESC
SELECT * FROM resource_allocation WHERE employee_id = 1
SELECT laptop_id, allocation_date FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocation_status = 'Active'
SELECT DISTINCT software_license_id FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocation_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT employee_id, allocation_status FROM resource_allocation ORDER BY allocation_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM resource_allocation
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, name FROM employees ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM employees GROUP BY department;
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE allocation_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT employee_id, resource_name FROM resources WHERE resource_type = 'computer';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT name, department FROM employees ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM resources INNER JOIN employees ON resources.employee_id = employees.employee_id;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM employees;
SELECT name, allocation_date FROM employees WHERE allocation_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, allocated_laptop_id FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM laptops;
SELECT brand, model, status FROM laptops;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE allocated_laptop_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE allocated_license_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM laptops WHERE status = 'Active' AND remaining_battery_life > 50;
SELECT software_name, license_key FROM software_licenses WHERE number_of_licenses >= 10;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees ORDER BY employee_role DESC;
SELECT laptop_model, laptop_serial_number FROM laptops WHERE remaining_warranty_months > 6;
SELECT software_name, license_key FROM software_licenses WHERE license_type = 'Enterprise';

SELECT employee_name, laptop_model, software_name FROM employees INNER JOIN laptops ON employees.assigned_laptop_id = laptops.laptop_id INNER JOIN employee_allocation ON employees.employee_id = employee_allocation.employee_id INNER JOIN software_licenses ON employee_allocation.license_id = software_licenses.license_id ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_name, laptop_model, remaining_warranty_months FROM employees JOIN laptops ON employees.assigned_laptop_id = laptops.laptop_id;

SELECT employee_name, software_name, allocation_date FROM employees JOIN employee_allocation ON employees.employee_id = employee_allocation.employee_id JOIN software_licenses ON employee_allocation.license_id = software_licenses.license_id ORDER BY allocation_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees, employee_role FROM employees GROUP BY employee_role;

SELECT employee_name, software_name, license_type FROM employees JOIN employee_allocation ON employees.employee_id = employee_allocation.employee_id JOIN software_licenses ON employee_allocation.license_id = software_licenses.license_id WHERE license_type = 'Enterprise' AND employee_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, laptop_id FROM laptops ORDER BY laptop_id DESC;
SELECT software_name, license_type FROM software_licenses WHERE employee_id = '12345';
SELECT DISTINCT laptop_id FROM laptop_allocation_log WHERE allocation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, software_name FROM employees JOIN software_licenses ON employees.employee_id = software_licenses.employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, laptop_model, software_name FROM employees JOIN laptops ON employees.laptop_id = laptops.laptop_id JOIN software_licenses ON employees.license_id = software_licenses.license_id;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT employee_name, laptop_model FROM employees JOIN laptops ON employees.laptop_id = laptops.laptop_id WHERE laptop_model LIKE '%ThinkPad%';
SELECT employee_name, software_name FROM employees JOIN software_licenses ON employees.license_id = software_licenses.license_id WHERE software_name = 'Microsoft Office';
SELECT employee_name, allocation_date, deallocation_date FROM employees JOIN laptop_allocation_log ON employees.employee_id = laptop_allocation_log.employee_id WHERE allocation_date >= '2022-01-01';
